title: Conspiracies.II.Lethal.Networks-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W

                          .the leading force.



                           proudly presents

     Conspiracies II: Lethal Networks (c) Anima ppd Interactive





  17-06-2011........Release Date  Protection............Laserlok

  Adventure............Game Type  Disk(s)..................2 DVD





  RELEASE NOTES





At the end of the year 2063, Earth joined the Peripheral Galactic

Alliance as an equal member. Now, for the first time, Earth is

expecting a significant improvement of its situation.



Everybody believes that a new era begins bringing closer co-operation

with other civilizations. An era of development and prosperity, that

leads to the eventual solution of the political, economic and social

problems of the planet.



Nick Delios, ex private eye and now a governmental secret agent, when

accused of attempted murder against Annita Argyriou, the President of

the powerful Detronics S.A., he realizes that someone has framed him.

In his effort to find the truth he will find himself in the middle of

multiple conspiracy networks existing throughout the Peripheral

Galactic Alliance, threatening even its own existence.



Conspiracies II - Lethal Networks is a Full Motion Video (FMV) 3D

adventure game. Featuring plenty 3d puzzles and riddles, a great plot

with complicated conspiracies, funny dialogues and situations that

unravels the story in a unique way.



The game hero, Nick Delios, with friends all over the world,

experiences new adventures trying to save Earth, meeting new people,

confronting new enemies, revealing new conspiracies involving now

different planets of our galaxy.



Features:



34 hours of game play



Up to 12 different levels-  worlds  with over 8-10 locations each



Up to 360,000 polygons for each location



Over 3.000 high definition textures



Simple point and click 3D gameplay with  a unique hint system friendly

to casual players, with challenges designed for the hardcore audience.



PhysX Nvidia Engine for sophisticated dragging and moving objects,

driving vehicles through tunnels and much more



High Resolution Shading Lightmaps and Shaders 2.0 + support



Over 2 hours of high definition video with 80 different actors



Over 90 minutes of orchestral and electronic music.



Full Length Film scoring soundtrack



DX10 Core Technology



XP/Vista / Windows 7 full compatibility





  INSTALL NOTES





1. Unpack the release

2. Mount or burn image

3. Install

4. Update game with C2_Patch110520.msi from UPDATE folder on DVD2

5. Copy all files from the SKIDROW folder on DVD2 to the game folder

6. Play the game

7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!





  ADDITIONAL NOTES





We noticed that the updated patch has some problems installing from DVD

on one of our test machines. If you got trouble installing the update

from DVD, copy patch to HD and run it there. Then it will work fine!





  GREETINGS





  Unleashed - TiNYiSO - MRN - RADIKAL - POSTMORTEM - GENESIS - SHOCK

         CRUDE - ReUnion - VACE - OUTLAWS - BACKLASH - Titan
